name: has_tag
example_comment: The above snippet returns **`true`** if the <%= doc_class_name  %> has the "arm" tag, otherwise returns **`false`**.
description: Returns **`true`** if this <%= doc_class_name  %> has the provided tag in its tag list.

parameters.name: tags_to_find
parameters.desc: The tag to search this <%= doc_class_name  %>'s tag list for.

return_value_desc: **`true`** if the requested tag is in the tag list, otherwise **`false`**
